availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thompson N. Finnell (Georgetown, Kentucky, town marshal)

body.p: Georgetown, Kentucky, town marshal. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Finnell. Father of Ida Finnell, William Finnell, Corinne Finnell, Thomas Finnell, and Price Finnell. Town marshal in Georgetown in 1860. Member of the Mount Vernon Masonic Lodge No. 14 in Georgetown in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Georgetown, District No. 2, p. 8.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Georgetown, p. 272A.
Find A Grave, "Thompson Nimrod Williamson Finnell (1829-1886)," Memorial #44264244, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44264244/thompson-nimrod_williamson-finnell (accessed January 24, 2018).
KYR-0003-092-0135.
